name: reversi-logic
description: Reversi game logic library. UI is not included.

scripts.test: parcel build --no-minify --public-url ./  test/concat.ts --out-dir test/dist  --target node --bundle-node-modules && jest
scripts.build: npm run ts:build && npm run browser:build
scripts.browser:build: parcel build --no-minify --public-url ./ --out-file reversi.js  src/index.ts --out-dir docs --global reversi

author: naosim
